summary: The implementation successfully addresses all four requirements by adding a local MindAR library file (placeholder), updating index.html to load from local path, removing CDN-specific type declarations, and cleaning up App.tsx to remove network checks and CDN validation logic. However, the MindAR library file is only a placeholder with instructions rather than the actual library content.

missing_requirements.requirement: Download the MindAR library and bundle it locally - the actual library content must be present, not just a placeholder
missing_requirements.reason: The file frontend/public/lib/mindar/mindar-image-three.prod.js contains only placeholder text with download instructions and a console.error, not the actual MindAR library code. The AC states 'window.MINDAR is successfully defined after local script loads' which will not be satisfied with this placeholder.
